text: The Seventh Curse is a 1986 Hong Kong adventure horror movie directed by Lam Ngai Kai and is based on series of books by Ni Kuang. It stars Chow Yun-fat, Chin Siu-ho, Dick Wei, Maggie Cheung, Sibelle Hu, Elvis Tsui, Chor Yuen, Kara Hui. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 adventure movies Category:1986 horror movies Category:Hong Kong adventure movies Category:Hong Kong horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Thailand Category:Golden Harvest movies
title: The Seventh Curse
